channel.title: Testing on YY小站

item.title: Debian升级Testing
item.description: 不建议升级testing 1 2 echo 'deb http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ testing main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/testing.list sudo apt-get update && apt-get -y upgrade 参考链接 https://wiki.debian.org/DebianTesting
